text: Kɨli bin si dun agɨl, wɨdɨn lɨl nep ajɨpal. Tap si tap tɨmel pel gɨpun ak kelɨgɨnɨgun agɨl gos ma nepal. Binɨb Klays nop gos kɨles ma nepal okok, kɨlop nebneb gɨ dad kɨd kɨli ak amel, tap si tap tɨmel gɨpal. Tap chɨn ke kuŋay yɨbɨl dun agɨl, gos kɨli nab ayaŋ anep lup. God kɨlop yul awl yɨbɨl ak ñɨnɨgab.
